ThingDef.label: hay fine meal
ThingDef.description: A complex dish assembled with care from vegetarian ingredients and hay. While being not too difficult to prepare, it is the most popular dish among ponies.

ThingDef.label: hay lavish meal
ThingDef.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this meal nourishes the body, mind, and soul. Very much appreciated by equestrian cookery enthusiasts.
